Olympic Issues Most media reported that North Korea had intended to destabilize the South Korean government, to disrupt upcoming elections and to frighten teams from attending the Seoul Olympics. They wish their nation would be highly ranked in the Olympic games. Every nation is interested in boosting its national prestige.
